(1231x1+0)/1 mod 4096 = 1231. (1231x3+1)/2 mod 2048 = 1847. (1231x9+5)/4 mod 1024 = 723. (1231x27+19)/8 mod 512 = 61. (1231x81+65)/16 mod 256 = 92. (1231x81+65)/32 mod 128 = 46. (1231x81+65)/64 mod 64 = 23. (1231x243+259)/128 mod 32 = 3. (1231x729+905)/256 mod 16 = 5. (1231x2187+2971)/512 mod 8 = 0. (1231x2187+2971)/1024 mod 4 = 0. (1231x2187+2971)/2048 mod 2 = 0. (1231x2187+2971)/4096 mod 1 = 0.
